embeds.title: Modulo
embeds.description: Given two integers *A* and *B*, *A* modulo *B* is the remainder when dividing *A* by *B*. For example, the numbers 7, 14, 27, and 38 become 1, 2, 0, and 2, modulo 3. Write a program that accepts 10 numbers as input and outputs the number of distinct numbers in the input, if the numbers are considered modulo 42.

fields.name: Input Specifications
fields.value: The input will contain 10 non-negative integers, each smaller than 1000, one per line.

fields.name: Output Specifications
fields.value: Output the number of distinct values when considered modulo 42 on a single line.

fields.name: __How to Submit__
fields.value:
There are two steps to submit your code for this challenge (Name: **Modulo**):
1. Go to <#743121731480191088> and create a ticket by reacting to the :envelope_with_arrow:! Once you have reacted to the ticket bot, your ticket will be created on top of all the channels.
2. Type your name, your PayPal email, and the code (notepad file if possible).

_This challenges ends in 1 hour, starting from when this post occurs. _
